ing: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped, or more to taste
1 clove garlic, chopped, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Tangy, spicy, creamy, and delicious, this may very well change the way you eat guac forever--or at least it will be your new favorite dip. Serve with chips or on your favorite tacos!"
ins: Place avocado, tomatillo, onion, jalapeno, garlic, lime juice, cilantro, cumin, salt, and pepper in a blender; blend until smooth, 2 to 3 minutes.
